reviewDetails.comment: In my first visit with Dr. Nagel, I felt that I was examined carefully and that there was a free exchange of information, questions and answers, that made me feel confident about my care.
Timely, thorough and pleasant.  I would highly recommend especially since she saw me on the weekend!
Excellent doctor. Spends time with patient to clearly understand patient issues. Comprehensive.

reviewDetails.comment: My mother is the initial patient of Dr. Koster for 10+ years.   She recommended him to me.  I’ve been a patient for almost 10 years now.  I do recommend his practice.

The doctor was absolutely lovely and great. But his staff just could not get my name right...maybe it was hard to read my license and insurance cards? But they also were intent on selling me on overpriced surgery for cataracts. It would be $8,200 for both eyes -- and that was MY portion. I went back to Dr. Louis Silva and he is a GEM. The surgeries with his expertise and kind and steady hand were $4,200. 
So, no go to Gentile retina and meet their fab team and see with more clarity than you would ever think possible!
Easy to make an appointment, took me on time, professional, explained my results in plain English, have used them for 15+ years
I was very satisfied with the service provided by Dr. Koster and the staff at NY Vision Group and I have recommended him to others.
Koster was very  friendly and goes through all options in doing cataract extraction also his staff was very helpful
He was very good .on point.

Dr. Koster takes the time to work with his patients, answer questions and explain any necessary follow-up. His practice is run very efficiently and all the technicians are pleasant and professional. I cannot recommend this practice highly enough.

reviewDetails.comment: She’s extremely opinionated about things that have nothing to do with your visit.  Additionally she claims that her office does draw blood in the office however I after my entire visit was then told that the laboratory they sent out to is not par with my insurance company so I asked why I wasn’t told ahead of time.  I come to find out that the person who owns the practice has his own laboratory and will only allow the doctors to send out to his private laboratory if billing  can be done as a non-par for all insurance carriers.  Not to mention the doctor confirmed an appointment with me the week before and then simply forgot I had the appointment with her and never wrote it down.
Dr. Muss is very knowledgeable on health issues. She is always accessible o me.
